member.name: T:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings
member.summary: Represents a class that holds the respective theme color and common key values for customization

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor to create an instance of MaterialDarkThemeSettings.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.GetPropertyMappings
member.summary: Helper method to decide on display property name using property mappings

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.HeaderFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of header related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.SubHeaderFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of sub header related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.TitleFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of title related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.SubTitleFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of sub title related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.BodyFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of content area of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.BodyAltFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate font size of content area of control in selected theme

example.code: MaterialDarkThemeSettings materialDarkThemeSettings = new MaterialDarkThemeSettings(); materialDarkThemeSettings.Body AltFontSize = 10;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family of text in control for selected theme

example.code: MaterialDarkThemeSettings materialDarkThemeSettings = new MaterialDarkThemeSettings(); materialDarkThemeSettings.FontFamily = new FontFamily("Callibri");

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.PrimaryBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary background color of content area of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialDark.WPF.MaterialDarkThemeSettings.PrimaryForeground
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary foreground color of content area of control in selected theme
